attributes.action: to make a maximum workimg temperature law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under present health and safety law a minimum working temperature is enshrined but there is no maximum. We call upon the government to enshrine a maximum working temperature in law

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to make a maximum workimg temperature law.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=workinghot


Her Majesty's Government
